Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.hologram

Class Hologram

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.hologram.Hologram
All Implemented Interfaces:
Holo
Direct Known Subclasses:
GlobalHologram, PlayerHologram
public class Hologram extends Object implements Holo
This class allows to create packet-holograms

    • isPersistent

      public boolean isPersistent()
      Description copied from interface: Holo
      Returns true if hologram is persistent. Persistent holograms are not automatically removed when far away. Though minecraft will un render them still, the custom range will not remove them.
      Specified by:
      isPersistent in interface Holo
      Returns:
      true if hologram is persistent.
